istreambuf::open

Opens the specified URL. 

istreambuf * open(
    const url & u);

Parameters

u

The URL to open.

Return Value

this on success, a null pointer otherwise.

Remarks

If is_open() != false, returns a null pointer. Otherwise, initializes the istreambuf as required.
